data.taskTitle: Extension: Popup UI with feedback form
Extension: Popup UI with feedback form
data.approach: Replace plain HTML popup with Svelte-based UI. Add svelte and vite-plugin-svelte to the extension build. Create components for: feedback form (title, description, type, priority), screenshot preview thumbnail, element selection preview, collapsible console log preview, submit button with loading state, and settings link. Reuse existing chrome.runtime messaging for data capture.

data.taskTitle: Extension: Popup UI with feedback form
summary: Replaced plain HTML popup with Svelte 5 component architecture
Added feedback form with title, description, type, and priority fields
Built screenshot preview with expandable thumbnail gallery
Built element selection preview with tag, selector, and screenshot
Built collapsible console log preview with type-colored badges
Added submit button with loading spinner state
Added settings link and clear-all-data button
Upgraded Vite 5 to Vite 6 for Svelte plugin compatibility
Configured vite-plugin-svelte with injected CSS for extension context
reviewFocus: Verify Svelte 5 rune usage in module-level store
Check chrome.runtime messaging works from Svelte components

suggestedTasks.title: Add Unit Tests for Feedback Popup Components
suggestedTasks.description: Create comprehensive unit tests for the new popup UI components using Svelte testing library. Focus on testing individual component behaviors, state management, and interaction flows. Tests should cover screenshot capture, element selection, console log rendering, and submit button loading states.
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure reliability and prevent regressions in new UI components

suggestedTasks.title: Implement Error Handling for Feedback Submission
suggestedTasks.description: Add robust error handling mechanisms for the feedback submission process. Create error state management, user-friendly error messages, and graceful fallback scenarios if screenshot capture or submission fails. Update UI to provide clear feedback on submission status and potential issues.
suggestedTasks.reason: Improve user experience and system resilience

patterns: Svelte component structure for complex UI interactions
gotchas: Ensure screenshot capture works across different browser contexts

documentationNeeds: Update extension README with new feedback mechanism
